content: as double_crochet *double_crochet until you reach the ch2 3dc in the ch2 * repeat *to* around until you reach the first double_crochet slip_stitch with it and fasten_off you will now place your work right side facing you and with your color a yarn join at the slip_stitch picking up the blo throughout this round 7 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern r1 ch3 counts as double_crochet working in the blo double_crochet in each slip_stitch all around until you reach the first double_crochet slip_stitch at the top of the ch3 r2 ch3 counts as double_crochet *double_crochet in each st until you reach a corner double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in the same st at the corner* repeat from *to* all around slip_stitch with the first double_crochet r3 ch3 counts as double_crochet *double_crochet until you reach the ch2 3dc in the ch2 * repeat *to* around until you reach the first double_crochet slip_stitch with it and do not fasten_off join your double edge border now is the time if you hadn t hidden your loose tails you can do so when you join your edges just sandwich those ends in between the 2 borders placing the 2 sides of your border edging together you will now single_crochet them together matching st to st single_crochet all around the borders edge assembling them both together once you reach the first single_crochet you made slip_stitch with it and fasten_off hide any loose tail and you are done 8 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern 9 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern other sizes for other sizes use the chart below as a reference to your stitch count starting chain number and number of row to complete your size blanket there are 2 options below one with drape and one without all sizes follow row 1-18 above and repeat 3-18 until row count is reached or desired length is met work the border the same for all sizes please note the below are measurements and stitch count for other sizes yardage will vary size with drape blanket size measurements stitch chain row count count crib 50 x 60 135 136 164 twin 60 x 90 165 166 254 full/double 76 x 90 213 214 254 queen 90 x 96 255 256 272 king 106 x 96 303 304 272 size without drape blanket size measurements stitch chain row count count crib 28 x 52 69 70 128 twin 39 x 75 102 103 200 full/double 54 x 75 147 148 200 queen 60 x 80 165 166 218 king 76 x 80 213 214 218 10 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern should you have any questions please send them to pattern help unrulystitch@gmail com feel free to use the hashtag #theunrulystitchmakes on instagram or facebook of your works in progress and finish pieces instagram https //www instagram com/unrulystitch ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/theunrulystitch this
